column2: High Rate Output of PVT Solution
Supported on:â€¢u-blox 8 / u-blox M8 from protocol version 19 up to version 23.01 (only with ADR orUDR products)

Note that during a leap second there may be more (or less) than 60 seconds in aminute; see the description of leap seconds for details.This message provides the position, velocity and time solution with high output rate.

column6: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.
GPSfix Type, range 0..50x00 = No Fix0x01 = Dead Reckoning only0x02 = 2D-Fix0x03 = 3D-Fix0x04 = GPS + dead reckoning combined0x05 = Time only fix0x06..0xff: reserved
